attributes.action: Change the law with regard to pension anuities.
attributes.additional_details: Please rethink the enforced annuity law currently in place. Retirees are losing millions every year with ever decreasing offers of pension payouts from self interested pension companies and financial advisors. People will eventually end up with nothing. People ought to be able to take their pension pot and invest it wherever they see fit without having to fund the financial industry.
